What I truly love about my profession is the ability to materialize ideas into products. I have had experience working on every part of the stack and in many different technologies. My strengths and passion however, lie in front-end design and development.

In my free time, I enjoy traveling, binge watching netflix, pixar movies and drinking lots of coffee!
